medications: Aspirin 81mg – One tablet once daily for 14 days
instructions: Keep the operated knee elevated while resting
Apply ice packs for 10 minutes every 4 hours
Straight leg raising and ankle pumps – 5 mins, 4x daily
Partial weight bearing with walker/crutch from Day 3
Avoid squatting and twisting for 3 weeks
dailyQuestions: Did you take prescribed medications on schedule?
Any knee locking or inability to move?
Did you complete physiotherapy exercises today?
